title: Google\Cloud\DataCatalog\V1\ColumnSchema
name: ColumnSchema
description:
A column within a schema. Columns can be nested inside other columns.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.datacatalog.v1.ColumnSchema

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.column
params.description: Required. Name of the column. Must be a UTF-8 string without dots (.). The maximum size is 64 bytes.

params.name: data.type
params.description: Required. Type of the column. Must be a UTF-8 string with the maximum size of 128 bytes.

params.name: data.description
params.description: Optional. Description of the column. Default value is an empty string. The description must be a UTF-8 string with the maximum size of 2000 bytes.

params.name: data.mode
params.description: Optional. A column's mode indicates whether values in this column are required, nullable, or repeated. Only NULLABLE, REQUIRED, and REPEATED values are supported. Default mode is NULLABLE.

params.name: data.subcolumns
params.description: Optional. Schema of sub-columns. A column can have zero or more sub-columns.
